name: Pang Pang Sauce
recipeIngredient: 4 to 6 tablespoons chicken broth or water
1 tablespoon minced green part of scallion

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender or food processor, combine the ingredients except for the minced scallion. Blend until smooth. Add the scallion. The sauce should have the consistency of lightly whipped cream. Serve with cold noodles, sliced cold poached chicken, cold sliced beef or as a salad dressing for cucumbers and red peppers.
